actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide assistance for child care services programs for the residents of transitional housing.
short_title: Transitional Housing Child Care Services Act

summary.text: Transitional Housing Child Care Services Act - Amends the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide child care assistance for transitional housing residents.

titles.title: Transitional Housing Child Care Services Act

A bill to amend the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide assistance for child care services programs for the residents of transitional housing.
